original_text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword, and shall be led away captive into all nations: and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles, until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled.
korean_text: 그들이 칼날에 죽임을 당하며 모든 이방에 사로잡혀 가겠고 예루살렘은 이방인의 때가 차기까지 이방인들에게 밟히리라

sentences.original_text: And they shall fall by the edge of the sword
and shall be led away captive into all nations
and Jerusalem shall be trodden down of the Gentiles
until the times of the Gentiles be fulfilled
